import React from 'react'; import { makeStyles } from '@material-ui/core/styles'; import TextField from '@material-ui/core/TextField'; import Typography from '@material-ui/core/Typography' import Avatar from '@material-ui/core/Avatar'; import Box from '@material-ui/core/Box'; import Button from '@material-ui/core/Button'; import Divider from '@material-ui/core/Divider'; import Grid from '@material-ui/core/Grid'; const useStyles = makeStyles((theme) => ({ root: { display: 'flex', flexWrap: 'wrap', }, textField: { marginTop: theme.spacing(1), marginLeft: theme.spacing(1), marginRight: theme.spacing(1), width: '42ch', }, })); export default function LayoutTextFields() { const classes = useStyles(); return (
